column17: Special Radio set with increased range for CGI / CA / AWACS. Additionaly  4th radio HF (2-50MHZ) for MiG-15/FW/Bf GCI
R-863 - AM/FM Switch Additional data in the Mi-8 manual
Intercom Switch on top left of throttle or in the stick (back seat) - Push and Hold
1st channel not for radio communication. It seems not implemented yet.
1st channel not for radio communication. It seems not implemented yet.
UHF Radio has Encryption - press the green UHF CDE button
FR-24 have 5 preset channels - 4 Normal + Guard
